analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x77b171cfde7325268a4ccd2816f23903616c43a0.sol:
	Contract wkaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x77b171cfde7325268a4ccd2816f23903616c43a0.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x77b171cfde7325268a4ccd2816f23903616c43a0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/33/0x77b171cfde7325268a4ccd2816f23903616c43a0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x77b171cfde7325268a4ccd2816f23903616c43a0.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
